name: WP SightMap
author: Studio by Engrain

sections.description:
SightMap is an interactive map application for anyone who interacts with an apartment, self storage facility, or other multi-unit property. It provides the easiest way for renters to search available units, as well as for anyone else interacting with the property to find their way.

SightMap Embed provides multiple ways to include your property’s SightMap in your website. It supports multiple styles – including a pop-up, or an inline frame – as well as an API so you can directly link to individual mapped units from your website’s floor plan listings or other directories.

If you have integrated your property management system with SightMap (e.g. Yardi, RealPage, ResMan, Entrata), your map may also show pricing and availability information to prospective renters, and will also support any rich media or conversion actions you have put in place.

SightMap is a product of Engrain

This plugin was developed by Studio by Engrain
sections.installation: Install and activate the plugin, navigate to the WP SightMap menu item, enter the SightMap URL given to you by the Engrain Support Team. The SightMap can be embedded on any page using the [sightmap] shortcode. Contact the Engrain support team for more advanced integration options.
sections.faq:
How can I get a SightMap?

SightMaps are provided by Engrain. There are multiple styles and price-points depending on your desired features. https://engrain.com/sightmap

Where is the documentation?

Documentation can be found at https://developers.sightmap.com/

What is my SightMap URL?

Your URL was provided when your SightMap was created. Contact support@engrain.com if you do not have your SightMap URL available.

short_description: This plugin provides an easy way to integrate the SightMap product by Engrain into your WordPress website.
